price: Poricao je Ad, pa kakva je bila kazna Moja i upozorenje Moje?!
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ عَادٞ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center

meta.transliteration: kadhabat ʿādun fakayfa kāna ʿadhābī wanudhuri
